titles.title: A bill for the relief of Meals on Wheels of the Monterey Peninsula, Incorporated.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-289.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/10/1987--Introduced. Relieves a named organization and all those employed by it after 1975 and before 1983 of all liability to the United States for payment of unpaid employment taxes with respect to services performed. Treats such services as employment for purposes of entitlement to social security benefits.
